name: transform-modules-eumd
description: Transform ES6 modules to UMD modules with per environment dependencies

scripts.lint: npm run src-lint && npm run test-lint
scripts.browserify-chai: shx echo "/* eslint-disable */" > test/amd/chai.js && shx echo "module.exports = require('chai')" | browserify - --standalone chai | derequire >> test/amd/chai.js
scripts.amd-test: shx rm -rf test/node_modules && shx cp -r test/umd_modules test/node_modules && npm run browserify-chai && karma start karma.conf.amd.js
scripts.browser-test: shx rm -rf test/node_modules && shx cp -r test/umd_modules test/node_modules && karma start karma.conf.browser.js
scripts.test: npm run node-test && npm run amd-test && npm run browser-test
